product_name: REI Merino Wool Mini Crew Light Hiking Socks - Women's
long_description: With naturally wicking fibers, these lightweight and cushioned ankle socks are a perfect fit for hiking and backpacking. Merino lambswool with nylon and Lycra(R) spandex provides durability and dependable fit. Stretch nylon reinforces heel and toe area for durability and comfort; arch band gives additional support. Uniquely formed toe area and Lin-Toe(R) ''no-feel'' seams keep socks smooth and nonirritating. *Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: With naturally wicking fibers, these lightweight and cushioned ankle socks are a perfect fit for hiking and backpacking.
